Rule and Administration

A major power in the Deccan region after the fall of the Mauryas. They were also known as 'Andhras'. They were matrilineal, as evident from the rulers' names (e.g., Gautamiputra). They were the first rulers to grant land to Brahmins and Buddhist monks.
